attributes.action: instigate a " Cut the Crap Campaign" and stop this unhealthy preocupation with unneccesary statistic gathering that is preventing the public service industry from actually delivering good services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work for a housing association which is ex council and myself and many of my collegues are run ragged having to complete statistics and try and deliver a service. It appears to be that you have to justify absolutely everything you do to this Government to the n-th degree, which results in staff spending more time notating what you are meant to do than actually delivering a service.  The only people that win from this over analysis of public services are the many, many consultants that they appear to have to draft in, increased tiers of middle management and the statisticians.
